activities.education: Encounter diverse wildlife, including alligators, birds, and turtles, while learning about the park's ecosystem.
activities.name: Anhinga Trail Tram Tour

activities.education: Explore the hardwood forest, discovering native plants and their role in the Everglades environment.
activities.name: Gumbo Limbo Trail

activities.education: Paddle through serene waterways, observing the abundant birdlife and learning about the importance of freshwater habitats.
activities.name: Nine Mile Pond

activities.education: Experience the thrill of an airboat ride through the Everglades, exploring its hidden corners and encountering wildlife up close.
activities.name: Everglades City Airboat Tours

activities.education: Ascend the tower for panoramic views of the Everglades, capturing stunning photographs of the vast landscapes and wildlife.
activities.name: Shark Valley Observation Tower

activities.education: Dive into the fascinating history and ecology of the Everglades through interactive exhibits and informative displays.
activities.name: Everglades Visitor Center

description: Embark on an unforgettable family adventure in the unique and captivating Everglades National Park.

foodRecommendations.description: Authentic Seminole cuisine, including alligator tail and fry bread.
foodRecommendations.name: Miccosukee Grill

foodRecommendations.description: Fresh seafood and local dishes with stunning waterfront views.
foodRecommendations.name: Everglades City Restaurant

foodRecommendations.description: Casual dining offering a variety of dishes, including alligator nuggets and frog legs.
foodRecommendations.name: Everglades Gator Grill

name: Everglades Adventure
